title: Can we opt out of this honor thing?
body: I hate seeing it win or lose. I don't care.

replies.body: you get free loot for it and help allies who played well also get free loot, why would you want to skip it?

Nope.

Being able to see proof of the fact you are a horrible (or great) person is probably part of the plan. It is meant to encourage good behavior and respect, and it is tied to hextech rewards now.
